Package nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.local

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocalAdaptor
    LocalAdaptor implements an Octopus adaptor for local operations.
    LocalCredential
    A dummy Credetial for local use.
    LocalCredentials
    A Credentials for local use.
    LocalFileAttributes
    LocalFileAttributes implements a FileAttributes for local files.
    LocalFiles
    LocalFiles implements an Octopus Files adaptor for local file operations.
    LocalJobs
    LocalFiles implements an Octopus Jobs adaptor for local job operations.
